name: UGG Cali Waterproof Sneakers - Men's
description: With their handsome full-grain leather uppers and classic lines, the Cali Waterproof Sneakers wear well and keep your feet dry during the rainy months. A lightweight and supportive midsole adds comfort for long days on your feet.Full-grain leather uppers with seam-sealed construction for weather protection.Textile lining lets your foot breathe and helps wick away moisture.EnerG Comfort insole has polyurethane pods for comfort and an antimicrobial top layer.Stippled Treadlite® outsole offers great traction.
